website_summaries.verdict: The premium HP Photosmart C410a is a viable purchase option if you need all-in-one functionality and will take advantage of HP's wireless and Web printing technologies.
pros: The HP Photosmart Premium C410a delivers respectable output speed and strong print quality across text, graphics, and photo prints, and features like ePrint and AirPrint increase its utility
cons: The Photosmart Premium C410a's main paper tray can only hold 125 sheets, its status LCD is tiny, and the print apps are of questionable value

customer_reviews.title: I've always loved that I can print directly to it from my ...
customer_reviews.text: I've owned this printer for several years now. I've always loved that I can print directly to it from my iPad and iPhone. The scanner and printer are pretty good quality. I couldn't use the HP software to scan because of an ongoing error I was getting, but I was able to download a free basic scanner software and it works fine. I've used it to fax with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Kaykay

customer_reviews.title: Beware of this printer
customer_reviews.text: Never again. Often stops communicating with my computer and needs to be rebooted or reset Also, this printer has a mind of its own, works when it feels like it, and it is very frustrating when you're busy and need it to work. I just cannot tolerate in unreliable printer. I'd rather HP left the wires than be so incompetent with the wireless technology. That's the end of HP for me. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Harris

customer_reviews.title: HP satisfies again
customer_reviews.text: HP has been my manufacturer of choice for printers since the early 1990s. I gave this product only 3 stars, because there's some well-known glitch that regularly won't allow me to print photos until resetting the printer completely, sometimes more than once or twice. It also does not print the correct size of image when my husband prints from his PC (I use a Mac) - the images come out way too small. The photos come out a little dark, but I imagine I can tweak that somehow with my photo app and/or printer settings. HP's support is very good. I would definitely recommend this All-In-One model for home use.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good print quality.
customer_reviews.text: The photos I printed were excellent. My experience with printers has always been with HP except for one Epson I've had for about 10 years - I really like the print quality of HP printers. The C410a began giving me problems after about 2 years by leaking black ink onto my pages from time to time, then the printhead quit working so I elected to replace the printer after having it 3 years, rather than purchasing a new printhead. Got another HP!
customer_reviews.author: D. G.

customer_reviews.title: HP Photosmart all in one printer
customer_reviews.text: So far we are satisfied with the capabilities of this printer. We did have some difficulty getting everything set up and working properly. The manual that came with the printer was of no help. Neither was the online help menu. My husband had to call 3 times for tech support. Each person he spoke to was in another country, but they stayed on the phone until he was able to get things working properly. The only downside I see so far is that each of the cartridges has to be bought separately and they are expensive. HP needs to include a more specific manual for those of us who are not tech savy.
customer_reviews.author: lacey

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this printer-in-one about a month ago & so far I really like it. I have always used HP products and this printer was a step up from the old HP I had to retire (gave it to a friend) because I needed a wireless. The shipping was very fast & the packing was the best I have ever seen. When I opened the box the printer was in a big nylon bag so all I needed to do was lift the bag up to get the machine out. Setup was pretty easy too. All in all I was pleased with this large printer and I thought the price was fair.
customer_reviews.author: NC Cat Lady

customer_reviews.title: do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrible product. when you feed more than 2 pages for copying or scanning it cannot take it. You get skipped pages ans it's a mess. The biggest frustration is also that when you try to copy or scan NOT using the feeder, this machine cannot tell and the feeder wheel starts automatically working and you get a blank page. Also the software is terrible, we had to delete and re-install twice since the scanner kept giving an error message that the document was already loaded. This was the worst product and most frustrating thing I ever bought from HP.
customer_reviews.author: MLE

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Very good printer so far. Works well over WiFi network, supports both iPad and Android phone printing directly. The output is good quality in both B&W and color. Has 5 ink cartridges that can be expensive to replace, I found the best deal at my local warehouse store for an entire set. I have used this printer for lots of large photos, envelopes, mailing and name labels, and text documents and it is performing well. The printing software loaded on the PC provides many options for settings and is easy to use. Overall, a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: TW

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this particular model because it was in Consumer Reports and received a good rating. The only thing I don't care for
customer_reviews.text: I've had this all-in-one for several years. I purchased this particular model because it was in Consumer Reports and received a good rating. The only thing I don't care for much is the way it prints photos, which is a pretty big deal to most people. I was disappointed, for sure, but I'm not positive that it is all the machine's fault - maybe there is something I could do to get better results? Maybe my photo paper is too old? Additionally, I think the ink is a bit expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Mamaskia

customer_reviews.title: Best Wireless All In One Printer
customer_reviews.text: This is the first wireless printer I have purchased that actually works - it DOES print, fax, copy and SCAN!! I have had 5 previous All In One units - all HP - that would never scan without major complications - only to not work the next time. This Photosmart is awesome - I can send photos when on vacation to the printer at home! Makes it so much fun to share our vacations with friends and family. The scan works beautifully - as does the print and copy features. Great value for the reasonable price. I would recommend it to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: OtanDear

customer_reviews.title: HP photosmart C410a all in one printer
customer_reviews.text: I received this printer from Amazon and proceeded to try it out. The hookup and wireless connection was simple. The copy quality was good. The only problems I had was the ADF, papers were sometimes off side plus it would not scan double sided paper. The black ink ran out after less than 100 sheets because of the small ink cartridge that came with it. I could have bought a larger ink cartridge that prints more than 100 pages. The good is picture quality is best in market. Overall very good but not the best all in one.
customer_reviews.author: J.R.V

customer_reviews.title: Photosmart C410
customer_reviews.text: The C410 functions well once it is set up properly. The challenge is getting the printer and computer to communicate via your wireless network. HP tech support had very young, inexperienced technicians who spent 5 hours going in circles. A 10 minute call to Apple support solved the problem very efficiently. However, a week later, the printer stopped functioning. This time, a quick call to HP solved the problem - the printer needed to be removed from the printer list and put back. Apparently, this is a common issue, and easily solved. Now it's up and running, and we can print from computers or smart phones anywhere (at home or away) there is an internet signal - a cool function.
customer_reviews.author: AR

customer_reviews.title: This printer is/was bad
customer_reviews.text: It's been a long time since I ordered this printer so I have the advantage of experience of time in use. The installation software and HP customer service for this product was the worst. Being an experienced user of IT hardware was the only reason I held on to it.
customer_reviews.author: R. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Hard working printer.
customer_reviews.text: Have owned mine for 3 years now and use it everyday. It has been flawless. It is easy to operate. I buy the cheap ink for it through Ebay and it has always worked fine for everyday use. Fax works great!
customer_reviews.author: stanley weber

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre At Best
customer_reviews.text: Owned this printer about 4 years. Text print quality is pretty good, photo print quality is bad, scanning quality is good but the provided software is only fair when used for scanning. I thought that spending more money would get a better all-in-one but that is not the case here. The best feature is that, coupled with the HP smartphone app and HP's other eprint options, you can print using many different devices. I would not recommend this printer.
customer_reviews.author: TravesTee

customer_reviews.title: Works just as expected
customer_reviews.text: So far I haven't had any issues with this unit. Having a document feeder has been a life saver. There were numerous times where it saved me hours of manual work. It's a decent looking printer and since it supports wifi, I have it tucked away in a corner in my home office. Photo quality seems to have dropped a bit but that just may be due to the low color ink levels. I've purchased the XL black ink cartridge and only HP papers so far. I'd highly recommend this printer for just about any users.
customer_reviews.author: Wonster

customer_reviews.title: A fine printer
customer_reviews.text: This printer does everything I need in a printer, plus a few things I haven't had a chance to use as of yet. It seems to be a bit slow to wake up and goes through the ink pretty quick. I've used it for a couple years now and on some good sized projects. It behave's beautifuly and the price was attractive. I hope this helps you decide. Ted
customer_reviews.author: Ted

customer_reviews.title: Great Printer
customer_reviews.text: I got this printer on sale for $99 !! The photos coming out of this printers are very good and I have no complains and it's relatively quicker - I use to own a HP photosmart D530 and comparably this ones faster than the D530. If you install the HP software, the scanning and other features are easy to use. Overall I am very happy with this printer and I would strongly recommend it - you can get it on sale, I would buy it for not more than $100, no printer is worth more than 100 bucks in my opinion as we keep investing on the cartridges for a long time ....
customer_reviews.author: Vikram

customer_reviews.title: It was a nice printer but in the end it was mediocre at ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a college Dorm room printer and I knew it was larger but it had all the features. I even bought an extra black ink cartridge. This thing hardly prints two term papers before saying its low and won't print in just black if ANY of the colors are out. It was a nice printer but in the end it was mediocre at the most basic job I needed ti to do. Great photo quality though, as I tried it for one just to see.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Lum

customer_reviews.title: great w/ my ipad
customer_reviews.text: I like having a wireless printer in the house. I generally do NOT go for all-in-one machines, too many things that could go wrong, but so far, I'm happy with this one. The photo quality is not the best, but I guess that's to be expected. Altho, not sure why they'd call it a PHOTOSMART if the photos aren't that smart. That being said... I love that I can use it w/ my ipad and my iphone. So simple.
customer_reviews.author: Shan ThomasTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: printer did not work and had to be returned
customer_reviews.text: the printer was out of warranty when I purchased it so i was not able to gain any tech support on an out dated machine. Hired a technician to install it but was still unsuccessful in getting the maching to work the package it shipped in had been shipped to several other locations previously I am grateful that they took the printer back and that my monies should be refunded from my visa card The price was good for the machine but since it didn't work the machine had no value to me. Im glad I got to return it
customer_reviews.author: Barbie L. Breathitt

customer_reviews.title: Worst printer I ever bought
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this even though I looked at the feedback here and another site saying it was a bad printer. IT IS A BAD PRINTER! It worked find at first but the black printing wasn't good and clear like it should be. Then, I got "Paper Jammed" error messages and I NEVER was able to get past that. Thankfully, Amazon let me return it and paid for the shipping too!! Don't purchase this!!!
customer_reviews.author: L. McBee

customer_reviews.title: Love automated duplex printing but...
customer_reviews.text: I love this printer. It is similar to the HP I had before that lasted over 10 years. Can't beat that. The automated duplex printing is seamless and a great way to save paper. The only thing I do not like is the separate tiny ink cartridges. Those are too expensive and I did not know I was going to get that. But I will just buy from a recycler of ink jet cartridges. Very fast printing and great quality. Other than ink, I would recommend for home or small business.
customer_reviews.author: DrMSG

customer_reviews.title: HP Is a Bid Let-Down!
customer_reviews.text: Very fussy, had to restart it all the time to get it to print. The picture paper loader didn't work half the time and said I needed to add more paper. The scanner function froze half the time. This all in one was a huge disappointment. Compared to the Canon Pixma MX882 it was totally unreliable. After all the problems I als have with my HP tower computer I am really donw on HP.
customer_reviews.author: William H. Hankin

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Don’t like any part of it. Big waste of money. Ink doesn’t last. My next printer will be anything but Hp.
customer_reviews.author: Steven R. Haglund

customer_reviews.title: The Best Photo Printer ever.
customer_reviews.text: It is so sad that HP no longer makes a quality photo printer or for that matter any quality printer. I had a C410a for about 8 years and the print head went bad. I found this one on Amazon and scarfed it up. It works just like my original one. Don't know what I am going to get after this one is shot. All of the HP printers that I looked at before I purchased this one were very poorly made.
customer_reviews.author: Wirebug.

customer_reviews.title: Great Printer and great price
customer_reviews.text: We had the older version of this printer and bought this one for a family member. We are jealous because this one has wireless printing from mobile devices...iPhone, iPad, etc. The printer is easy to use and will do anything you need it to do. We use ours for a small business and have had no need to explore for a new one as it has been a great printer. No complaints here.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Smith

customer_reviews.title: Best printer I ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I had another one of these printers that I bought 5 or more years ago that quit working. Best printer I ever owned. I was happy to replace it but the price was insane, more than double what if originally sold for.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy L.

customer_reviews.title: Super HP Printer
customer_reviews.text: We decided to purchase a more expensive printer since the cheaper ones never lasted. While we have had this a relatively short time, it has been perfect. A plus is the feature that allows you to print from your smartphone or another computer via the internet. the printer has its own email address. We are very happy thus far.
customer_reviews.author: nobeachman

customer_reviews.title: Would get another All In One....
customer_reviews.text: printer works great when it works however there are quite a bit of issues with not printing, scanning etc. This is my second one exactly like this and the same thing happened to the first one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worst HP Printer I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst HP printer that I have ever owned. I have had numerous problems with it including paper jams and printer lock ups . THe only reason that I bought it was because it was the only Photo quality printer that they made with a wired fax line.
customer_reviews.author: Wascalwy Wabbit

customer_reviews.title: C410
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for the price. Does everything well. Really like the E-Print (actually have used with great results) Only cons-takes forever to crank-up after sitting idle and is quite noisy doing so. Also, do not like the load tone when the machine is turned on. Otherwise is best printer so far
customer_reviews.author: David Crowder

customer_reviews.title: uses way to much ink
customer_reviews.text: prints well but constantly replacing ink cartridges. I am an occasional user - 2-3 times per month and only a few pages at a time.
customer_reviews.author: dh

customer_reviews.title: Great Printer for the money....
customer_reviews.text: This all-in-one printer is just what I was looking for in duplex printing, wireless printing and all-in-one for the home use I bought it for. This replaced my other all-in-one printer without the duplex printing and wireless printing. Ink consumption is the only thing that seems to go pretty quickly at least for the regular black, but that is just for the starter ink cartridge so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We love this printer.  Great for PC and Mac!
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great printer for us. We print from our iphones, ipods, and MAC as well as my work PC without issue. I have had guests at the house print without issue from their laptops as well. GREAT PRODUCT and other than the high cost of ink (they all are) we are very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Ssterling

customer_reviews.title: A great deal on a great printer.
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful printer. It works well with all of my Macs and iDevices. It will also wirelessly scan. Because it is a printer with a scanner built-in, it will also align the printer heads automatically. No more printing out a test page and then adjusting the print head settings, then printing out another test page to make sure you adjusted it correctly.
customer_reviews.author: S. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Great printer, super easy set up, arrived as ordered
customer_reviews.text: This printer was so easy to set up. The controls walked me through it, including connecting to my wireless network. I was up in about ten minutes. The only thing I haven't figured out is how to get the scans into one file and onto a computer wirelessly. It's pretty quick too. THe color and pictures come out quite well.
customer_reviews.author: K. Kohatsu

customer_reviews.title: Still works like new.
customer_reviews.text: Been a few years now. Still works like new. Make sure your table is strong enough to rock n roll. It likes to move when in operation but I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Woodman

customer_reviews.title: it won't work.
customer_reviews.text: It seemed that exactly AFTER the warranty expired the damn thing stopped printing. Am so damn angry!!!!!!!! If I could give it zero stars, I would. Don't buy it. It's junk.
customer_reviews.author: dl8ch

customer_reviews.title: Have been very satisfied with my 4 in one printer
customer_reviews.text: Have been very satisfied with my 4 in one printer. I use it everyday for work (am a teacher) and it is still going strong!
customer_reviews.author: Viva

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this printer/copier/fax/scanner. It does it all and is very easy to use. Only so so issue is the usage of ink, but cartridges are less expensive than my old HP printer, so I guess it balances out ok. Would highly recommend this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Penny L. Hotzel

customer_reviews.title: Printer does what it's supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: The HP Photosmart 410a is a good printer, probably the best I've had from HP in years. Seems to be dependable, does what it was designed to do, and once HP fixed the glitches in e-printing, prints flawlessly. Only complaint is that it uses a lot of ink, at least compared to other printers.
customer_reviews.author: BillP

customer_reviews.title: ink guzzler
customer_reviews.text: I've had this printer for just over a year and barely use it. I've replaced the ink many, many times. In fact I just replaced all cartridges and it is printing grey. It's very frustrating. I intend to call the company tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: Sea

customer_reviews.title: As ecpected
customer_reviews.text: I received this printer in a timely manner and had it up and running in about an hour. The software took the longest to load and setup the system. We use the printer for printing bills and labeling envelopes for our small business which has cut the time in half. Since we can connect it to the router my wife can now print from her computer. We have only had it for about a month now and it works great, how it does a year from now may be a different story but for now it's a great printer.
customer_reviews.author: Guy M. Heminway

customer_reviews.title: Awesome printer
customer_reviews.text: We couldn't be happier with this purchase! The ease of setup-didn't take long at all! Ease of printing wirelessly is the best! Even get a notice to your iPhone or iPad if you are out of paper! Owned for only a few months now, ink still good. Printed multiple documents and several pictures, ink levels still good!
customer_reviews.author: Colleen E.

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Printer
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd HP Photosmart. I literally printed my first one to its death. It was a workhorse. This one has additional features, such as the fax and top-feeder copier, which I love-love-love!
customer_reviews.author: P. Gonyer

customer_reviews.title: It was good while it lasted but like most of the cheaper ...
customer_reviews.text: It was good while it lasted but like most of the cheaper models od HP sooner or later it becomes cheaper to replace than continue on with them.
customer_reviews.author: betty j boeke

customer_reviews.title: Loud
customer_reviews.text: good machine, ok on the ink usage but could be better. The only problem I have with it is that it is loud.
customer_reviews.author: CLS

customer_reviews.title: nice printer
customer_reviews.text: Very nice printer. It has printed very well, scans duplex and prints duplex (big plus). Have not used the fax but all other functions are great. one word of caution, it is worth buying new ink with it because the ink doesn't last long.
customer_reviews.author: J3B_TK421

customer_reviews.title: Wireless printer
customer_reviews.text: I like the Photosmart C410 however when I go wireless, it don't work proper. When I reboot the computer or turn off the printer then later back on, the wireless can not find my computer. I need to reinstall the printer or do a usb to wireless each time. When working on some functions, it is very slow. The scan does a great job on OCR to word 2003 and PDF is great. If the wireless would work proper, I would give it a 5.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne E. Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I love MY PRINTER THIS is my second one. It makes very good pictures. I love the way I can make envelopes so easy. I also love the wireless feature. I have the computer on one side of the room and the printer is on the other side. And it works very fast
customer_reviews.author: AJLEJEUNE

customer_reviews.title: Printer Bad - Seller Good
customer_reviews.text: This review in no way reflects on the fine service I got from the seller. The printer is another matter. It is extremely poorly documented as to using the features and functions and is in fact just difficult to use. My previous HP All In One Printer was set it and forget it. This one requires default settings to be changed for almost ever task you perform. It also has a bug somewhere within the driver software that is causing my PC to crash. HP customer support is readily available IF you can understand them! Their solution for all problems is to uninstall and reinstall the software.
customer_reviews.author: Nadores

customer_reviews.title: I like this all in one printer.
customer_reviews.text: This printer was purchased because the prior all in one HP printer we were using would get in a recyling startup loop and did not have e-print. This printer is a bit larger than the old one. The new printer had problems with the automatic paper feeder not picking up paper but that seams to have resolved with cleaning and reinstalling the pickup rollers. I will need a bit more time to assess ink usage and reliability to fully review the product.
customer_reviews.author: Removed for security purposes

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: Still working perfectly, with all the features of current models. I bought mine almost 3 years ago.
customer_reviews.author: GA Travel

customer_reviews.title: Copy Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely wonderful copier. Easy to set up and install. Great prints, copy's, and scans. I highly recommend. I got it at a great price through Amazon too!
customer_reviews.author: side_show_tom

customer_reviews.title: hp photosmart c410a fax wireless printer
customer_reviews.text: it arrived on time. we immediately hooked it up and it works perfectly. it is a real pleasure to use and so easy to use too.
customer_reviews.author: galebettyboop

customer_reviews.title: One oof the best
customer_reviews.text: One of the best for the price. The second printer of this model that I have owned. Would get another if required.
customer_reviews.author: Rock

customer_reviews.title: Excellent printer
customer_reviews.text: As always I am impressed at the quality of this printer. HP always makes great products. I am a fan.
customer_reviews.author: Golfstar83

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Printer!
customer_reviews.text: After much research I chose this printer. It's fast, clear, easy on the consumables, and good ratings. It's also one of the printers that my iPad and iPhone can print to directly. With Rendezvous it has become the perfect network printer. My kids actually set it up. I was printing in minutes and the quality is excellent. Great choice. BTW, this was the best price I found and the shipping was amazingly fast.
customer_reviews.author: A Reflection of Myself

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use All in One
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up on network and easy to use. Fairly fast printing. Good consistency in color and greyscale. Good solution for office and home. Easy to scan/fax multiple pages.
customer_reviews.author: CA Strawberry Girl

customer_reviews.title: great printer.
customer_reviews.text: easy set-up, all wireless printer prints great from my iPad, iPod touch, and HP desktop. prints great looking photos and documents. All are printing wireless from my WiFi, using Verizon MiFi. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: J. Greene

customer_reviews.title: great printer
customer_reviews.text: I use this printer in a business. I liked so well I bought 2 more. The quick scan feature is great for emailing company documents. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Doug Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Fragile- broke right after warranty expired
customer_reviews.text: The product was working well and printing quality images but it didn't last at all. One month after the warranty expired the photo tray stopped feeding. It's a shame that nothing is made to last but this printer is practically new. I would stay away unless you are prepared to buy a new printer after a year.
customer_reviews.author: VGC

customer_reviews.title: My iPad loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this printer so I could print from my iPad. It works just great with the iPad and with my other three (Mac and PC) computers wirelessly. Photos are georgeous. Color printing is very bold and crisp. Scanning and faxing is a snap. I also love the ability to print on both sides of the paper. Minimal setup. Only negative is that I'm going through a lot of black ink, but since I use it for work, I guess that is to be expected. I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Boehme

customer_reviews.title: Oy!!!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if it the fault of my computer or the printer, but the machine only works when it wants to. I have to keep disconnecting and reconnecting it to make it print.
customer_reviews.author: jnfwordsmith

customer_reviews.title: still going strong!
customer_reviews.text: I'm ! HP person. and I love this printer so much! very easy to connect and use.! I even print things from my iphone! ilove that! I just wish the ink was less expensive!!!!! sometimes I can go for months and months without using it just because I cant afford the ink!!! but its awesome to have an all in one printer at home! specially when you take a photo and want to print it RIGHT NOW! hahaah I also love the fact that I can send an email from wherever I am and it will print at home!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Laura M

customer_reviews.title: Love this Printer
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't too sure which printer to buy. After reading some positive reviews on the HP C410a I decided to buy it. The printer set up easily and works great. It prints very Quickly and the fax works great. The 4x6 photos are outstanding. I recommend this printer highly and found the prices on Amazon were much lower than most others.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Palmdale CA

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Printer
customer_reviews.text: This printer couldn't print an envelope right if it had to. It is very slow to start up after sitting idle for a while, and the ink is expensive and the XL cartridges don't last very long
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my schoolwork. Great price and buy! Has went over an beyond my expectations. The quality of the print is great too!
customer_reviews.author: A. Gray

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend  it the perfect printer.
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this printer. It is very easy set up and simple to use. I already own one I purchased this one for a freind. It is perfect for a small businesses. The one I own is over three years old and I had no issues with it yet. Real good printer especially for a multi function one at that.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Great so far
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I don't know about is the ink consumption. Hopefully it will be as good as others have said. Setup was a breeze, it's really nice to finally have a wireless printer.
customer_reviews.author: Texasraider

customer_reviews.title: a must buy
customer_reviews.text: easy to install compatible with windows and mac wireless works great and iprint is really neat great for a small business or family that uses a printer frequently for what ever reason. great buy
customer_reviews.author: rjmartino

customer_reviews.title: HP Photosmart C410a All-in-one
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this device. It was easy to install and operate. It came with very few instructions, other than the info and help available on line; I prefer to get more written material, but it is up and running very well. A very good value.
customer_reviews.author: James Boutilier

customer_reviews.title: The printer did not meet my expectations because although it ...
customer_reviews.text: The printer did not meet my expectations because although it appears identicial to the replaced printer, it does not print from the internet. It does print from Word and Excel.
customer_reviews.author: William R, Gooden

customer_reviews.title: Bad buy
customer_reviews.text: It constantly goes off line and then says error. Can't get it back on line without calling geek squad for help and a charge. Would like to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Reed Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Arguably the best consumer grade color printer
customer_reviews.text: High print quality on economical paper is why most of us buy these types of printers, and the C410 delivers. Print speed could be faster, but overall, I'm satifsied with the purchasing experience and the product.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Derosier

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Printer - Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Although this was last years model, it was the replacement for the printer we used to use. New features are great and printer works very well in the wireless environment. HP eprint is a great feature. Very satisfied with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: David B Gaddie

customer_reviews.title: Great Printer
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this printer to replace a Kodak all in one that frequently locked up my computer. I have not had my computer lock up once since hooking up this printer and the colored copies made on this HP printer are identical to the original documents. Love this printer!
customer_reviews.author: Big Dog

customer_reviews.title: Great all in one but....
customer_reviews.text: This thing DRINKS ink...its a good all in one though...the ink just runs out WAY too fast!!! thats its only downfall..
customer_reviews.author: Ghost1

customer_reviews.title: Nice Printer
customer_reviews.text: Very nice printer, but when it comes to scanning, we sometimes have to completely reset it. I'm not sure what the problem is with that, but fortunately, we don't have to scan very often, so it's not a big deal. Otherwise, I love the wireless printing.
customer_reviews.author: R. Wentz

customer_reviews.title: Hp c410a printer
customer_reviews.text: The price as very good and the delivery fast. The printer however is hard to set up esp for fixed ip.
customer_reviews.author: J. David Winningham

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Printer
customer_reviews.text: This printer combo is excellent, I needed to fax a few times and never knew how so never purchased one but now with the ease of instructions from HP it's great , it was very easy to setup and the picture quality is super.
customer_reviews.author: Mucko

customer_reviews.title: Photosmart printer works great
customer_reviews.text: The Printer was a little difficult to set up for a "rookie", but works great. I have one complaint. The delivery tray is non-exsistent ! Printed work delivers on top of paper tray and then falls out (on the floor in my case) but, photo printing is top notch !
customer_reviews.author: van

customer_reviews.title: HP PHOTOSMART C410a All-in-One Review
customer_reviews.text: I had a printer just like this before, and I loved it, so wanted another just like it. The price was much better than directly from HP. I have had no problem at all and will remember Amazon when I need the next one.
customer_reviews.author: Edna Kasper

customer_reviews.title: The Photo Access Tray would not work properly. The ...
customer_reviews.text: The Photo Access Tray would not work properly. The tray jammed and mulitated the Photo Paper. I GAVE UP !
customer_reviews.author: William Wheat

customer_reviews.title: A True Pig
customer_reviews.text: It works. One star. It eats ink like a SUV eats gas in rush hour traffic, scans a 25 page b/w text document only to create a file larger than 10 MB, and sends multiple annoying messages to to your computer screen the second it senses you are less than half full on one of its extremely low capacity overpriced cartridges. I hate this HP cash cow.
customer_reviews.author: Kentro

customer_reviews.title: <sigh>
customer_reviews.text: Forget the printer, and let's focus on the software. It sucks... more than the printer does. The software is painfully slow, not very intuitive, and not always willing to communicate with my computer. I've done the whole update/reinstall routine. Also, I have a pretty powerful PC. In my opinion, this software is plain ol' lame.
customer_reviews.author: David Hurt

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I like this printer.Plain and simple. It works great and was a breeze to setup. The photo printing leaves a little to be desired but all and all its a solid printer.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Not compatible with iTunes printing
customer_reviews.text: I've had this printer for a month or so now and really haven't played around with it much aside from your standard home printing. Today, I've tried to print jewel case inserts using the iTunes "print" function only to find out that the printer is not compatible to this iTunes function. I've spent time online looking for solutions and apparently, this is an issue and people are not happy about it. I'm not happy about it. I like to create my own cd's and print out playlists and case inserts. If I had known about this prior to buying my new printer, I most likely would not have bought this.
customer_reviews.author: BAustin

customer_reviews.title: works great was delivered in a very timely manner
customer_reviews.text: works great was delivered in a very timely manner , 1 hr. set up and it works fine .
customer_reviews.author: rwy

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Product
customer_reviews.text: Setup was easy. Wireless setup easy. Computer setup easy. Printing quality is great. Love the applications that you can download. I print them out constantly for my daughter to color and do the different activities. This is my first scanner printer and I used it to scan in all of my old pictures. The thing that impressed me was that i could do multiple pictures in a scan. The scanning software recognized on it's own that there were multiple pictures. If i had to do it one picture at a time it would have taken forever.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this baby
customer_reviews.text: My neighbor purchased this one and he raved about it, so I gave it a try. Easy to set-up, easy to use. I have only used the copy, scanning and printing so far and it's great. Seems like the ink usage is decent. I have not printed or copied photos so I can't comment on that. If you are looking for a wireless printer, this seems to be the best deal out there.
customer_reviews.author: Kupe

customer_reviews.title: New printers
customer_reviews.text: They are excellent quaility. The printed documents and photos are exquisit. Now most of the office staff have all the same printer. Works out great when it comes to ordering ink.
customer_reviews.author: Dobrinski Brothers Inc.

customer_reviews.title: It had no cd, so I could not work ...
customer_reviews.text: It had no cd ,so I could not work the photosmart until I received one.I
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: An older model, but does everything I want it to do - and more! Purchased to duplicate same model at second location.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT DEAL !
customer_reviews.text: This printer is great! It does it all. I had to get rid of my old HP printer due to the USB port not working & couldn't be fixed. So I deceided to go with another HP. It's bigger than my old one but for the price I got on Amazon compared to retail store- was a great deal. So far I have not printed any photos yet or done any scanning. but I will definitely try them out. Its a little loud when the cartridges are cleaning themselves but other than that, I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: dee

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!!! Great wireless printer!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesistant to buy this because of all the 1 star reviews, but I'm glad I did! My wife put the cd in her Macbook Pro and had it up and running in 30 minutes. The printer works with our iphones and ipads too. Really impressed! IMPORTANT NOTE: Make sure to put the photo paper glossy side down for printing photos. We had a couple of photos that looked like impressionist paintings before we realized the paper was in wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Beware not everything works
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this printer for the Fax as well as printing combination. Everything seemed to be working, we received faxes and we were able to print from our computer. The very first time we tried to fax a report or scan one, it would not work. The printer said we had a paper jam but when we opened the top to free the jam a plastic feeder fell out. We were unable to get the installed back in. It should have been a simple thing to put back as it turned out nothing worked. It looks like we will have to get another printer and fax.
customer_reviews.author: Camp tall pines

customer_reviews.title: GR8 HP Printer
customer_reviews.text: The best printer I have used. 25 years of using various printers (mostly HP) this is the best. After a few seconds of warm-up when first turned on, it is very quiet, fast, and smooth. Simple to set up. Can't yet tell about ink consumption as I'm still using the setup ink cartridges which are very small. HP coulda, shoulda provided regular cartridges. I like it enough to have bought another for the wife. Neither have had any jams or other issues. Great photo printing.
customer_reviews.author: jakcal

customer_reviews.title: HP Printer
customer_reviews.text: Great Product. It was more than what I had expected. Excellent performance. Eprint and fax worked exceptionally well. The two side printing worked great
customer_reviews.author: Marvin Shectman

product_meta.title: HP Photosmart C410a Premium Fax Wireless e-All-in-One (CQ521A#B1H)
product_meta.description:
The HP Photosmart Premium Fax e-All-in-One, lets you print, fax and copy two-sided documents automatically, make copies without using a PC and scan documents and photos. Share the HP Photosmart Premium Fax e-All-in-One with multiple people using wireless and wired networking. You can also send emails, photos and everyday documents from a smartphone, notebook PC or other mobile device directly to this photo printer and even print from anywhere, anytime. A 50-page automatic document feeder makes it easy to fax, scan and copy multiple pages and the photo tray lets you print photos without changing paper. Use the 2.4" color display to print Web content such as coupons, recipes and more without using a PC. You can also edit and print lab-quality photos without a PC using the display and memory cards slots. The HP Photosmart Premium Fax e-All-in-One saves you time and money with five individual inks - replace only the cartridge that runs out.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Count on complete versatility with the HP Photosmart Premium Fax e-All-in-One, which lets you print, fax and copy two-sided documents automatically, make copies without using a PC and scan documents and photos. Share the HP Photosmart Premium Fax e-All-in-One with multiple people using wireless and wired networking. You can also send emails, photos and everyday documents from a smartphone, notebook PC or other mobile device directly to this photo printer and even print from anywhere, anytime. A 50-page automatic document feeder makes it easy to fax, scan and copy multiple pages and the photo tray lets you print photos without changing paper. Use the 2.4" color display to print Web content such as coupons, recipes and more without using a PC. You can also edit and print lab-quality photos without a PC using the display and memory cards slots. The HP Photosmart Premium Fax e-All-in-One saves you time and money with five individual inks - replace only the cartridge that runs out.


WHY BUY?




SPECIAL OFFER



FUNCTIONS




FEATURES






SPECIFICATIONS





REMEMBER ORIGINAL HP INK AND PAPER



SAVE MONEY when you choose high-capacity cartridges over standard ones








WHICH HP PRINTER IS RIGHT FOR YOU? 




Compare the good, better and best side-by-side







 1. Requires a wireless access point and an Internet connection to the printer. Services may require registration. Apps availability varies by country and language. For details, http://www.hp.com/go/ePrinterCenter.
 2. Requires an internet connection to the printer. Feature works with any internet- and email-capable device. Print times may vary. For a list of supported documents and image types, see www.hp.com/go/ePrintCenter.
 3. Supports iOS 4.2 devices (iPad, iPhone 4, iPhone 3GS, and 3rd and 4th generation iPod touch) that support multitasking. Works with HP ePrint-enabled printers and All-in-Ones. AirPrint and iOS 4.2 devices require an 802.11 wireless network connection to the printer. Wireless performance is dependent upon physical environment and distance from the access point. AirPrint and the AirPrint logo are trademarks of Apple Inc. iPad, iPhone and iPod touch are trademarks of Apple Inc., registered in the U.S. and other countries.
 4. After first page; see www.hp.com/go/inkjetprinter for details.
 5. Average based on ISO/IEC 24711 or HP testing methodology and continuous printing. Actual yield varies considerably based on content of printed pages and other factors. Some ink from included cartridge is used to start up the printer. For details see www.hp.com/go/learnaboutsupplies.
feature_bullets: Fax, scan and copy unattended, and handle two-sided documents, using the 50-page automatic document feeder.
Print and share from multiple PCs, and stay connected, using integrated wireless and wired networking.
Wirelessly print directly from a smartphone, using HP mobile printing applications.
Save time and paper by printing two-sided documents automatically.
Use the color display to print photos and make copies, scans and photo reprints.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars350 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
